title: Colorescience Colorescience Skin Brightening Face Primer SPF 20 (Line Tamer) 1 fl oz - 1 fl oz
description: Gain an even playing field without caking on the makeup. Colorescience Skin Brightening Face Primer SPF 20 (Line Tamer) instantly reduces redness, pores, shine, and fine lines and wrinkles. The silky texture matches your skin, giving the appearance of a naturally flawless face. It contains a natural SPF of 20 to protect from sun damage. Formerly known as (Line Tamer)

title: Earth Science A/B Hydroxy Night Rejuvenator, 1-Ounce Glass Bottle
description: Scientifically formulated to rejuvenate skin overnight. Fortified with a blend of alpha and beta hydroxy acids and hyaluronic acid to fight the appearance of aging. Plant-derived ceramides add moisture to keep skin smooth, firm, and supple. For evening use only.
